prompts: Create a vibrant grass-type Pokemon with a huge red flower on its head and a blue body.
I want a cute Pokemon that resembles a small plant with large pink petals and a blue base.
Generate an adorable creature with a round blue body and a large, colorful bloom on top.

Design a playful Pokemon that combines a blue base with a bright, oversized red flower.
Show me a unique Pokemon that features a large flower and a small, round body.
